markdownRemark.html: I am pleased to annouce that Vince Bonfanti is coming to present the next version of BlueDragon at the March meeting for the JaxFusion user group. Vince Bonfanti is president and co-founder of New Atlanta Communications. We look forward to seeing him at the March meeting.

frontmatter.title: Vince Bonfanti of New Atlanta coming to present at JaxFusion
Vince Bonfanti speaking at the JaxFusion meeting tonight
